title: The Biden DOJ continues its war on Christian Americans | Flipboard
text: The Biden DOJ continues its war on Christian Americans Since the moment he took office, Joe Biden and his administration have engaged in a full-fledged campaign to weaponize the federal government against their political opponents and people of faith.
